tasks.all: deno fmt && deno lint && deno task check && deno task test && deno task coverage
tasks.check: sh -c "git ls-files -z | grep -zE '\.(mj|j|t)sx?$' | xargs --null --max-args=1 -- deno check"
tasks.release: deno task all && test -z "$(git status --porcelain)" && GITHUB_TOKEN=$(gh auth token) deno run --allow-env=GITHUB_TOKEN --allow-net=api.github.com --allow-run=bash https://deno.land/x/shipit@0.6.1/shipit.ts
tasks.udd: sh -c "git ls-files -z | grep -zE '(\.(mj|j|t)sx?|^deno.jsonc?)$' | xargs --null -- deno run --allow-read=. --allow-write=. --allow-net https://deno.land/x/udd@0.8.2/main.ts"
